outcome: Council deploys emergency task force, leading to temporary stabilization.

events.description: Council establishes an emergency task force with representatives from each faction to coordinate recovery efforts.
Council announces stabilization progress, urging citizens to remain calm as service disruptions reduce but tension remains.
Public morale temporarily improves with the perception of government control as access to services begins to improve.
Council receives preliminary support from some international entities, hopeful for resolution but long-term stability remains elusive.
